page.title: 20Teeside Polytechnic
page.content: Teeside Polytechnic is situated at Flatts Lane,Normanby below the hills with the main site in Middlesbrough. It is a College of Further Education. Students are 18+. Courses are full-time or part-time. The two main departments are the Education studies department where they train teachers and run in-service courses. In the management studies department students train to be managers in factories etc. Facillities include library, cafe, restaurant , bar, pool table, table tennis, computers, video cameras, and a gymnasium.
